My Bookings
{{booking.airline}}
{{booking.numberOfBookedSeats}}
{{booking.departure?.place}}
{{booking.departure?.time | date}}
{{booking.departure?.time | date:'shortTime'}}
{{booking.price}}
{{booking.arrival?.place}}
{{booking.arrival?.time | date}}
{{booking.arrival?.time | date:'shortTime'}}
Cancel
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { BookingRm, BookDto } from '../api/models'; import { BookingService } from './../api/services/booking.service'; import { AuthService } from './../auth/auth.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-my-bookings', templateUrl: './my-bookings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./my-bookings.component.css'] }) export class MyBookingsComponent { bookings!: BookingRm[]; constructor(private bookingService: BookingService, private authService: AuthService, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { if (!this.authService.currentuser?.email) this.router.navigate(['/register-passenger]']) this.bookingService.listBooking({email: this.authService.currentuser?.email?? ''}) .subscribe(r => this.bookings = r, this.handleError); } private handleError(err:any) { console.log("Response error: ", err.status); console.log(err); } cancel(booking: BookingRm) { const dto: BookDto = { flightId: booking.flightId, numberOfSeats: booking.numberOfBookedSeats, passengerEmail: booking.passengerEmail } this.bookingService.cancelBooking({ body: dto }).subscribe(_ => { this.bookings == this.bookings.filter(b => b != booking) }, this.handleError); } }
